title: WTB - T206 Wid Conroy w/ Bat
author: zappadelta

posts.post_title: WTB - T206 Wid Conroy w/ Bat
posts.post_content:
PSA/SGC 3 or above. Nicely centered preferred (of course). Would consider RAW, if the price is right. Looking for all backs. 

PM with pics/price. Thank you ~

I have a Raw Conroy P350-460 F25.  At immediate glance it presents as Ex+ with no creases/wrinkles however there is one corner with significant damage.  I’d estimate the technical grade to be about VG+.  Price $50.  

Email: [url]Scottglevy@yahoo.com[/url]
